artist: Painter: After Fra Bartolommeo; Engraver: Francis Englehart
description: Christ Child lying on the ground with his head on a cushion; Virgin kneeling at right; St. Joseph sitting at left; child John the Baptist in right distance; ruined building at center
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscriptions

below image in black: FRA BARTOLOMEO PINXIT   ENGLEHART SCULP. / HOLY FAMILY | on sheet in pencil: 2-227
title: Holy Family
